entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
